body:
@rafaelfranca 

`first_or_create`, `first_or_create!` and `first_or_initialize` all have the same problem. They do not create association record for hm:t .

This PR fixes the issue for the first two.

In order to fix `first_or_initialize` I invoked `build` on proxy instead of base object but found that

```
physician.patients.build(name: 'neeraj').save!
````

does not create the association record.

I could not find any documentation stating that `build` does not support hm:t .

In short this PR does not fix `first_or_initialize` . For that I am going to open another issue and will look into that. If that issue is fixed then it should be easy to fix  `first_or_initialize` .
